description: Erection of side and rear dormer roof extension.
decision_conditions: It has not been demonstrated that the materials for the proposed development would be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse. Therefore the proposed development would fail to comply with condition B.2.(a), Class B, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

It has not been demonstrated that the proposed side window would be obscure-glazed, and non-opening below 1.7m above the floor level of the room in which the window/roof light is installed. Therefore the proposed development would fail to comply with condition B.2 (c) (i) (ii), Class B of Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
